Header: Two die from road accidents in Welikada and Wariyapola
Content: A biker died near Electricity Board junction, Welikada after hitting on a CTB bus running towards Kottawa, yesterday. The dead is a 45 year old from Wataraka, Padukka. Meanwhile another died in Wariyapola after being admitted to the hospital from a serious injury caused from an attempt to catch a bus towards Puttalam. The victim is a 56 year old resident of Wariyapola. The accident has happened around 7 pm.
